text:
i have HTTPS set up for my web server. apache in windows 2K crashes frequently 
with error 

[Fri Sep 26 13:56:13 2003] [crit] (10038)An operation was attempted on 
something that is not a socket: Parent: WSADuplicateSocket failed for socket 
432.
[Fri Sep 26 13:56:13 2003] [error] (2)No such file or directory: master_main: 
create child process failed. Exiting.
[Fri Sep 26 13:57:13 2003] [error] forcing termination of child #0 (handle 564)

can you please help me in this situation since we are not able to proceed with 
what we are doing

thanks

jana
creator: jchellaperumal@ptc.com
